Package com.jcabi.dynamo.retry

Class ReFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.dynamo.retry.ReFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Frame, Iterable<Item>, Collection<Item>
    @Immutable
@Loggable(1)
public final class ReFrame
extends Object
implements Frame
    Frame that retries on failure.

    0.9
